fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 82.4/86.5/90.6% of Attack. 4.2/4.4/4.6% chance to inflict Despair for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Negative Pile

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to 1 foe equal to 130.5/136.4/142.3% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 45% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Psiodyne

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 7.8% when ambushing.
innate_skill.name: Fortified Moxy III

innate_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 16.9% when it rains.
innate_skill.name: Ambient Aid III

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17.4%. For each foe with a debuff, increase user's ailment accuracy by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Joy of Plunder

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17.4%. For each foe with a debuff, increase user's ailment accuracy by 10%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Joy of Plunder I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 17.4%. For each foe with a debuff, increase user's ailment accuracy by 12%. Stacks up to 5 times.
passive_skill.name: Joy of Plunder II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
